attributes.action: Peace in Palestine and more food supports as soon as possible for humanity.
attributes.additional_details: My hearts cries every time I see the people injured and many dead. I would kindly request more to be done to stop the war in Palestine even in other parts too. so that we can GET peace in this world. because the UK Gov has more power than me and many. I want help to stop the wars. and eye for an eye is not the way to go. Please I plead you consider my petition.
attributes.background: I want the Gov. to send more supports food to reach Palestinians to feed the innocent people there and support from Gov to lead to peace, a conclusion and resolution for peace.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions:

Seek to start peace talks between Israel and Palestine to resolve the conflict: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649401

Increase aid and support for Palestinians: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/648337
